subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Angel McCoughtry scored 23 points after missing two games with a knee injury, and Sancho Lyttle added 19 to lead the Atlanta Dream (5-7) to a 74-64 victory over the Liberty in Newark.
snippet: Angel McCoughtry scored 23 points after missing two games with a knee injury, and Sancho Lyttle added 19 to lead the Atlanta Dream (5-7) to a 74-64 victory over the Liberty in Newark.
